column1: Uchi////They were able to sit us at the bar
column2: and we knew right away we wanted to try the omakase
column3: which consists of 10 courses (desert is the last one). Well
column4: at the end of 2h sitting at the bar they had served us only 7courses... Looking around the bar you could tell other people were also getting impatient with the long delay in getting the food out. The chefs in front of us is apologizing for the delay and asking us if we would like to cancel the order as they were running behind... There were 6 chefs or whatever they are called
column5: in front of us and all of them were working frenetically. Non stop. However
column6: that doesn't change the fact that I expected much more from Uchi
